Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Toledo in 1973...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Boston (FBA) on 6/28/1983, striking out 9...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Wisconsin on 1/31/1984 (Going to WIS: P L. Marx, RF A. Sinclair. Going to PIT: LF A. Rahim, 1B K. Garrett, 3B J. Hollingsworth, CF B. Perales)...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1984, hitting .433 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1984, hitting .388 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1984, hitting .330 with 30 HR, 121 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 6/5/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1985, hitting .381 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/12/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $2,985,700 per year...
Traded from Pontiac to Plum Grove on 7/30/1988 (Going to PG: RF A. Sinclair, P J. Morello. Going to PON: P W. Stevens)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1988, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
